CustomField.description: Where clause condition string in the form of "{0} = 'Business_Organization' OR {1} = 'Corporations_and_Organizations", where {0} refers to the first field in the "Where Clause Fields" field.{BLANK} does not inherit default.{v.recordId} is contact/account's donor Id.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the form of "{0} = 'Business_Organization' OR {1} = 'Corporations_and_Organizations", where {0} is the first field in the "Where Clause Fields" field.{BLANK} prevents inheriting default value.{v.recordId} is contact/account's donor Id.
CustomField.label: Where Clause Condition String
